name: inline

relating to or using inline skates: inline wheels inline skaters the in-line design of the skates
included as part of the main text on a page, rather than in a separate section: Inline citations can be easier to read than footnotes. inline pictures
with parts arranged in a line: an inline 6-cylinder gasoline engine
